title.native: ビキニ・ウォリアーズ

description:
Set in a an RPG-style world with swords and magic where adventurers form a party to challenge the demon king's right to rule, adventurers all have beautiful breasts, enormous breasts, and bikini armor!!

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Bondage
tags.description: Features BDSM, with or without the use of accessories.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

title.native: ビキニ・ウォリアーズ 限界突破、掟破り

node.description:
__Doujin Circles:__ Nekomaru Shouten (猫マル商店), Kabe no Saido (壁の彩度, Chroma of Wall)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_saitomasatsugu) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/_saitom_) | [Pixiv](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=152240) | [Drawr](http://drawr.net/saitom)

Masatsugu Saito is a Japanese designer, illustrator, and mangaka. Began as a doujinshi artist and illustrator for adult magazines under the penname *saitom*. He made his professional debut on the animated film [Expelled from Paradise](https://anilist.co/anime/13391/Expelled-From-Paradise/) as a character and mechanical designer. Saito is also known for his character design work for the video games Xenoblade Chronicles 2 and Xenoblade Chronicles 3 by Nintendo.

**Notable works outside anime:**
~!
- Fate/Grand Order (Video Game, 2015) (Bradamante Design)
- Girls' Frontline (Video Game, 2016) (ACR Design)
- Fire Emblem Heroes (Video Game, 2017) (Laevatein Summer variant illustration)
- Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (Video Game, 2017) (Main Character Design)
- Xenoblade Chronicles 3 (Video Game, 2022) (Main Character Design) !~

[Website](http://www.din.or.jp/~redbear/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroerei)

He is known as Red Bear from TEX-MEX when doing doujinshi.

__Doujin Circle:__ Neko wa Manma ga Utsukushii

[Website](http://nekoman9.x.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomanHisasi) | [Piapro](http://piapro.jp/hisasi) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/119045)

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/Tony_T2ARTWORKS) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/50314970)

Tony Taka, also referred to as just Tony is a Japanese manga artist, video game artist and character designer. Upon graduating from art design college, he first began working on advertisement designs, but in 1998 subsequently changed careers to become a manga/anime style artist. Soon after, he began illustrating for numerous eroge and designing their characters, thus quickly gaining himself renown and popularity. Apart from his illustration work, which has since encompassed designing general games such as the recent iterations of Sega's popular Shining roleplaying game series, he is also executive director of his own company, RPM Y.K.

Doujin Works:
* Botan Nabe (Clannad)  Kaburimono 1 (Ragnarok Online)
* Nantoiu Deculture! (Macross Frontier)
* Nekomimi Batoraa (Hayate no Gotoku)
* T2 Art Works (Bleach)
* Hitagi ONESIDE (released during C77)

Contribution in games:
* Shining hearts
* Fault!! (ero)

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"
